@ 2noobsc0uter
NEVER, EVER, install a game, let alone a cracked game to c:/ or any partition of a HDD that c:/ is mounted on.
If you only have 1 drive, get an external drive and mount it there, the necessary config/profile/save/reg files will find their way to c:/ where they are needed.
If you have an SSD, this doesn't matter, wear levelling encodes data evenly on the chips, 'partitions' are only for organizational needs of the user.
